title: Not all apps transferred when updating from Pixel to Pixel 5
content:
hi - can you help/have you experienced something similar?
I recently bought new Pixel 5 and followed instructions to transfer data and apps from my old Pixel 2. 
I used the transfer cable.
Some, but not all, of the apps came across.
There are a large number still not come across - like 30+. Which is too many to reload manually.
I've updated phone software, all apps were bought from Google Play Store.
(Is it because I have two gmail accounts? Or is it because some apps are a couple of years old?)
Any help, appreciated. 
thanks
If you could keep your help simple, no 'curse of knowledge' in the way, that'd be great. thanks.
Chris
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
